tr.td: AU wins toss and defers to second half
Trey Boor kickoff 58 yards to the MU07, Matt Wirick return 22 yards to the MU29 (Griffin Walizer).
Alex Downard pass complete to Brenner Cruce for 28 yards to the AU43 (Jeremy Gonzalez).
Austin Roberts rush for 1 yard to the AU42 (Jeremy Gonzalez).
